titleStmt.title: Master Hollis his speech in Parliament concerning the articles of high treason against himselfe, the Lord Kymbolton, Sir Arthur Haslerigg, Mast. Pym, Master Hampden, Master Strewd, exhibited by His Majesty on Wednesday the fift of Ianuary 1641.
Speech in Parliament concerning the articles of high treason against himselfe
titleStmt.author: Holles, Denzil Holles, Baron, 1599-1680.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Francis Coules and Thomas Banks,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
